title: Psychopath

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Kill a player at night.
You will have the abilities of two Town (Investigative) roles not in the game.
You will appear as an investigative as your choice to all investigating players.
Kill one player immediately, all of the town will know what has happened.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: During a kill, your defense will drop to none.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last person remaining at the end of the game.

desc:
Post 814
(i wonder if anyone can guess where this is from)
